Reviews.Title: “NASTY PLACE in need of Repairs”
Reviews.Author: TOWERTREE1987
Reviews.Content: Looks great from the outside but, wait til you get into the room. The window had crack in it and they put tae on it. The wall had MOLD on them and stains too. The bathroom had a big water stain around the light and shower tube cieling is falling in. The bedspread was stained with bleach so, I gues the washer here does work. We set in the lobby and a guy came in to complain that a part on his car was stolen and desk clerk said it happens when you leave your car, not our problem. Now I am real concerned about tonight and our car outside. I will say that the pool was nice and warm and that was relaxinging. The brakfast was not a regular comfort inn style but, it was fine. I would say next time, ask to see a room before you check in cause this was not worth the price.

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: abelmom
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for the flight the next day and left our van there, The staff was very good, the room was spacious and clean. We had an early flight and our grab & go breakfast wasn't thawed out so the clerk let us toast some bagels and had fruit to take with us. The driver that picked us up was very quick to get us from the airport since we were early arrival.

Reviews.Title: “Gross.”
Reviews.Author: copyrocket
Reviews.Content: Good: close to the airport for the park and fly Bad: if you don't mind outdated, worn out, mildew in the shower, and a junk van taking you to and from the airport then this might be for you. I would rather sleep at the airport next time.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: MagsFtWayne_Ind
Reviews.Content: I stayed here with a group of friends for one night before taking a flight from Indy airport. The rooms were spacious and clean and the pool was great. We had a very early flight so ordered the grab and go breakfast which was very basic but was appreciated as we usually don't get any breakfast at all when we leave before the kitchen opens. The shuttle was on time and got us to the airport in very good time. More importantly when we returned from our trip it took only a few minutes for the shuttle to pick us up at the airport to collect our car which was parked at the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “A nice comfortable stay..”
Reviews.Author: roops_11
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here for two days .We were in town for the Indy car race..This place is reasonably priced and was nice, clean,comfortable ..The staff was quite friendly.They had convenient free shuttle service ,free breakfast and a nice pool.The shuttle service to the airport made it quite handy and accessible..Will definitely return !

Reviews.Title: “Comfort Inn is Comfortable!!!”
Reviews.Author: Kelley C
Reviews.Content: I have beens staying here for work for the past month, I check in on Monday's and out on Friday's. So to date, I have been in 4 different rooms ranging from two queens, one king, and even a suite with a kitchenette and whirlpool bath. Every single room I have been in has been immacualate- upon arrival and when I get to the room at night. Housekeeping does a great job! They have a breakfast they serve every morning and it is good, they have fresh fruit, yougurt, homade waffles, scrambled eggs, various muffins and toast. Dry cereal and juices are available as well. The coffee is my morning savior! Every morning that I have been there, they have plenty of people in the breakfast area eating so for those previous reviews who said the food was terrible, it can't be too bad! Plus just for the record, it's not! As far as guest services go, the staff has been nothing but extraordinarily nice and helpful. Again, not sure what happens with every customer, but at this Comfort Inn the staff is great! Alex, goes ABOVE and BEYOND to make the guests feel welcome and make sure they enjoy their stay. They are always avaiable if you need anything; extra pillows, blanket, or just a wake-up call. I have not gone swimming here, but from my room I can see the pool and exercise area and I see people swimming and working out! So again, I do not know what was happening when ChipAnnDale were there but the Pool looks very inviting to me! So, overall this experience at Comfort Inn-West at Indianapolis has been a good one. I definately reccomend this hotel if you are in the Indy area and need to be close to the airport. I would stay here again in a minute and would not think twice about it!

Reviews.Title: “What an awesome Place”
Reviews.Author: TomColumbus
Reviews.Content: We ended up coming to this hotel on our way to visit family from out of town. The staff was great, rooms were spacious and clean. The hotel is close to shopping, which allowed us to let our kids to run around after the long drive. The fridge in the room allowed us to keep juice boxes for the kids cold and the sofa bed was surprisingly comfortable. In the morning, we had the nice continental breakfast and we were off on our drive. While we only stayed there for one night, if we travel through the area again, we will definitely be staying there.

Reviews.Title: “Great price, great room, great pool and 6 miles from airport!”
Reviews.Author: lpaul1008
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay here. The help was friendly and everyone was smiling. The breakfast was wonderful!!! The three of us had almost everything on the breakfast bar and it was all fantastic! The pool is beautiful and so warm - the pictures don't do it justice - it's much prettier than that! Live palm trees and tropical plants all around it - gorgeous! The balcony in the hotel overlooks the pool, the breakfast bar and the sitting area - very pretty. The rooms are very clean (a little outdated but not terrible) and the beds are sooo comfortable - sheets are awesome, lots of pillows. We were very impressed, especially at the price we paid. Great value and we had a great time! Shuttle to the new Indy airport runs every hour/24 hours a day and only 6 miles away AND we got to leave our car there at the hotel for the whole week we were on vacation in CT!!! Beats parking at the airport! Definitely recommend this hotel and the park, sleep and fly option!!!

Reviews.Title: “Not new. Not clean. Not Responsive!”
Reviews.Author: ChipAnndDale
Reviews.Content: My husband and I and our daughter stayed here, thankfully for only one night. We chose this location because it was listed as new, had an indoor pool and a kiddie play area. The play area was shut down. We were told, "there had been a water leak." Yet we noticed that many of windows on the play area had been papered over and that there was a bunch of dust on the others. This play area had obviously not been available for a long, long time. The pool was cloudy and had a layer of scum in areas. Throughout the motel, we saw cosmetic issues. By the vending machines, baseboards and trim were falling off the walls, for example. In our room, one of the comforters on the bed was ripped; on the other bed, the dust ruffle was ripped half the way down the bed. In the shower, the shower curtain had blood on it...yuck! We called, asking for a replacement one and were told, "I'm the only one here and there's no one to install it...blah, blah, blah." After looking at the breakfast (I am a manager at a restaurant), we chose to not eat there; our experiences in the rest of the motel had us even questioning whether it was safe to eat there...we picked up food outside the facility. The place looked very little like the photos showed. When we asked for the manager, he told us they had no control over the photos on the website. While he apologized for the experience, he gave no explanation for it and simply handed us our receipt and said good bye. In the end, we paid $140 (including tax) for a $50 property. We plan on writing the company and asking for recompense. I would never recommend this place to anyone at anytime. The staff was friendly, but a friendly staff at a terrible property doesn't do it.

Reviews.Title: “NO!!”
Reviews.Author: jazzy925
Reviews.Content: Do not stay at this Hotel unless you want your wallet stolen from your room.. Houskeeping manager stole my friends wallet rom our room after we asked not to have our room cleaned. Police was called and a report was filed and the turned in the wallet....DO NOT STAY HERE!!

Reviews.Title: “Good one night stay, nice heated indoor pool!”
Reviews.Author: Lurajean
Reviews.Content: Good hotel near restaurants, very nice heated pool, close to.airport and attractions, elevator takes forever better to take the stairs, kids game room was under construction but will be very nice for families when finished

Reviews.Title: “May 2011 stay ok, good location, easy drive to Speedway, would stay here again”
Reviews.Author: whirligig
Reviews.Content: Accurate reservation, no problems checking in or out. Front desk staff friendly, quick, helpful with directions & gave me a map to area attractions, restaurants, etc. Older facility. Rooms do show their age & wear but the bedding was clean, neat. Comfortable bed. Bathroom very clean, no complaints. Microwave in the room. Indoor pool area well maintained. Breakfast choices were good for this type of hotel - waffles, fresh hot scrambled eggs (watched the cook scrambling them on the stove), muffins. Hotel has Wi-Fi, not the fastest connection but adequate. TV was fair, not a lot of cable channels, and the set worked. This Comfort Inn is very close to the interstate but traffic noises were not an issue - that was surprising. Parking lot well lit, never had a problem parking close to hotel entrance.

Reviews.Title: “Drove 5 hours to find no room at the inn”
Reviews.Author: peter_puck_69
Reviews.Content: Made an online reservation with my credit card AAA membership and my Choice hotels membership and when I arrived man on duty at front desk said he had no record of my confirmation number. Totally insolent. Contacted reservation center and was told my reservation was cancelled at the property. Talking with a supervisor he told me there was a room for me there. At the property the man on duty said they were full. Why book there your room won't be there at the end of your long drive. I can't wait to hear the other side of this story. I drove 5 hours after a full day at work to find out at midnight that I never did have the room that was confirmed in an email to me.

Reviews.Title: “rude annoying uncaring”
Reviews.Author: raegarr08
Reviews.Content: So I actually work at a comfort Inn never in my life would I speak the way the employee at this hotel spoke to me. She was rude. we had to almost change rooms 3 times in a matter of 15 mins! the first room didnt have a fridge when she said that it did. i need it for my meds we go to her she acts like we did a disappearing act with the fridge in the room like its our fault its missing... so we move to another room where the tv has no sound and the heater made the whole room smell burnt . so we ask for another room all they had left is no fridge room again. so i said thats ok can i just have a refund ill stay somewhere else she told me no laughed said you work at a comfort inn we are independtly owned and we dont give refunds.... uh I paid almost $100 for a one night stay and your telling me i have to stare at a soundless tv all night because of a medical condition i need a fridge... at our hotel we would have never done this. I can tell you straight up they have no respect for the people who stay here as a choice hotels employee for 2 years im saying please save your money!

Reviews.Title: “Won't stay again”
Reviews.Author: MESClifford
Reviews.Content: First off this was my fault - I thought we were staying at another comfort suites. This one had lumpy carpets, leaky roof, loid pipes. NEVER EVER read the reviews when you already are in bed. . . Yuck

Reviews.Title: “Rudest lady ever--Sabrina”
Reviews.Author: lmjohnfk
Reviews.Content: DO NOT STAY AT THIS HOTEL UNLESS YOU ENJOY RUDE SERVICE!!! PLUS, THERE IS NO SUITES THIS HOTEL--IT SHOULD JUST BE COMFORT INN!!! I had left a Coach purse (the wrist ones) in our bathroom at this location. I called the very next morning to see if it was found. They told me they would call me back. I ended up calling them back to see if it was found or turned it yet & was told that she talked to the housekeeper and she didn't find it & it was not in lost and found. I asked her what was I to do: call and make a police report or wait to see if it shows up. She said that I should wait and she'd call me if it turned up. Well, SABRINA called my hotel "19-20 times" asking where I was, if I was in my room, and being just RUDE to the front desk lady at our current hotel. I called Sabrina and asked her if she called and I have never had such bad customer service in my whole life. She proceeded to tell me that I was responsible for my belongings, it isn't their problem and how dare I accuse an employee of 12-15 years of stealing. It was my problem I left it, not theirs. Then I asked her why she was being so rude to me and then I immediatly asked her what her name was and she hung up on me. I called back immediatly and she picked up the phone and hung it up again w/o saying anything. DO NOT STAY HERE!! THE RUDEST STAFF EVER, ROCK HARD "NEW" BEDS, AND MOLD IN THE A/C UNIT!!! Stay at the Comfort Suites @ 2750 Fortune Circle West, Indianapolis, IN 46241. Way better staff, hotel, pool, customer service and much better rooms for the same price.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel near airport”
Reviews.Author: nanagaga42
Reviews.Content: This hotel is close to the Indianapolis airport. We were able to leave our car in their parking lot and save the cost of airport parking. The Comfort Inn shuttle took us to the airport. Our stay was practically free due to the savings on the parking. We had an early morning flight so an overnight was very helpful. This is a new Comfort Inn Suites. It is in beautiful condition and ver reasonably priced.

Reviews.Title: “Great!”
Reviews.Author: Scrtnote99
Reviews.Content: I rely heavily on reviews to pick great hotels, so I thought important to add my own. We recently stayed at this hotel for "Park and Fly" purposes. The rooms were clean and comfortable. The shuttle service was OUTSTANDING. The pool was a relaxing way to spend the evening. It is not a fancy hotel by far, but for the price and the convenience of the shuttle service, and parking, it was great. I would recommend staying here if you need to fly.....

Reviews.Title: “Good deal for the price”
Reviews.Author: Maryker
Reviews.Content: My family and I just returned from Indianapolis and stayed at this hotel while we were there. Several years ago we had stayed here and were disappointed but decided to try it again based on recent reviews. For the cost of the lodging the hotel is pretty average. The rooms and lobby area were very clean and the desk clerks were helpful. The glass in our room's window was broken and tape over but since I did not have small children I really wasn't concerned. The pool area does need some updating - the walls need to be painted and the bottom of the pool is chiping in many areas, some of those areas quite badly. Overall if you're looking for a clean hotel at a good price this would definitely be an option for you.

Reviews.Title: “It's fine; rooms are clean and spacious-great for special events”
Reviews.Author: HuBison
Reviews.Content: There are conflicting reviews on here, but I was here for NCAA weekend and it was just fine. I had called around and spoke to the manager and this hotel was one of the only ones with shuttle service (and I am told they also have shuttle service for Indy 500 weekend); the Sleep Inn right next door seemed to be the more preferable place to stay, but it wsa booked (I think they were recently renovated). The room was nice and clean and spacious. Loved the microwave, but the cord didn't reach and we had to move it onto the desk to plug it in. Mini-fridge in the room and a whirlpool tub (don't know if that's in every room). The manager is super peppy, organized, and pleasantly full of energy. There's nothing close by and you have to cab it or rent a car. If you're there a special event weekend, they will probably have a BBQ. Like most Comfort Inns, they include breakfast, no meat, but you can make a waffle and have eggs along with most of the regular breakfast items.

Reviews.Title: “Updated and Smart”
Reviews.Author: stjohn308
Reviews.Content: Our last visit to this hotel wasn't as great as we expected, but let me tell you how pleased we were today. The front desk was delightful, although a larger group was comng in, our reservation was handled quickly and pleasantly. We were very tired. Our room was impeccable, and exactly what we ordered. A light buffet of cheese, fruit, crackers and wings, was very much appreciated, I mentioned that I never had wings but was trying "one". About half hour later, my phone rang, and Tiffany wanted to know if I enjoyed the wing. How delightful. I would highly recommend this hotel. Dawn, the manager, has done a great job here.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place for an Event”
Reviews.Author: MikeandLuci
Reviews.Content: We have over 360 people at our two day event and everyone at the Comfort Inn and Sleep Inn was great to work with. The rooms, food and area worked out great for our event and we look forward to working with them again

Reviews.Title: “Average Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ragemcsmom
Reviews.Content: On a recent trip to Indianapolis we stayed at this hotel. We were greeted pleasantly at the front desk. Our room was comfortable and a good size with a flat screen TV. There was no microwave or mini-fridge in the room although I didn't ask for one either. The continental breakfast consisted of cereal, bread, biscuits, scrambled eggs, gravy, make-your-own waffles juice, coffee, tea, and muffins. My biggest complaint with the hotel was the need to redo the eating and swimming pool rooms. Apparently, they had a water leak and the damage was apparent with a bit of wall coming down and rust stains.

Reviews.Title: “Two chances, not again.”
Reviews.Author: EmilyRose82
Reviews.Content: We had stayed previously in this hotel and while the experience was okay it wasn't the best. However we decided to give it another chance while we were in town for three nights as it was close to the location we were visiting. My family (4 people) had reserved a suite, with the complete understanding that a suite consisted of a king-size bed and a pull out couch. My sister had been injured and I was to be sharing a bed with her, so we wanted a larger bed. My parents had no issues sharing the couch. We arrived really late the first night and while we were disappointed that the suite had been given away, we were understanding. Especially when the night manager stated that he would put on our file that we were to be moved the next day to the suite. We watched him put some paper in our file and place it aside. Okay good, we were satified. The next morning we verified that we were to be moved to the suite with the same individual still on duty. The individual stated that everything had been taken care of. We were told that we could return at 3 and move our stuff to the new room. So we left, returning promptly at 3, despite having to leave the party we were in town for. Where we were told that there was nothing on our file, and that there were none of the suites that we had paid for available. The individual at the front desk proceeded to explain to my father that a suite was no good for a family of four adults as there were not enough beds. He was rather insistant and kept repeating this fact, telling us that we were best off in a double. My father, however, is just as insistant. Eventually they sent us to another room, a more expensive suite I believe, stating that we should be staying in the other room, but that they would "show us" a suite to prove that it would not be good enough. We ended up staying in the suite, despite the headache and stress it caused. While it did get resolved, it was not worth the problems generated. Next time we'll be staying elsewhere.

Reviews.Title: “Very cordial and accomodating”
Reviews.Author: Ron_E_B
Reviews.Content: I been here several times and all the staff is attentive and helpful. They rate very high but for no specific reason other than overall nice and accomodating. I feel like I am at home when traveling and staying here. Whether I'm barefoot in the lobby or TV common area or discussing business with associates in the tabled common area for guests it always provides my needs and in a comfy way.

Reviews.Title: “It was good for the short amount of thime that we were there!”
Reviews.Author: kmds1951
Reviews.Content: My daughter, my 4 yr old grandson and I had planned to stay at this facility because we planned to fly to Az early the next morning. I had booked it thru Chiocehotels.com. I was quite suprised that the hotel was as clean as it was. I was expecting something not as comfortable and presentable. I had read a few less than favorable reviews at this facility. I had called the desk prior to our leaving to make sure that it would be clean and presentable. It was in fact very nice and staff were extremely nice . The only thing that I could comment on that was a huge disappointment was the fact the water in the indoor pool was cold (during Feb). We had packed our swim wear and it was sad to see my grandson disappointed (he had never stayed in a hotel before) when he tried to get in the water and his little lips were quivering. Other than than, very good customer service and the price was not bad.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Customer Service!”
Reviews.Author: rhedott
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel overinight to catch an early flight to Hawaii. This was in the middle of an ice storm and the parking lot and sidewalks were coated in ice and more coming down. The owners and hotel staff actually met us at our cars and drove us and other guests from the parking lot to the hotel entrance. Because road conditions were too bad to drive any distance for food, these same staff members drove us to the next door Sam's Club to buy hot deli food, and we were picked up and driven back to the hotel when we were done shopping. The next morning these same owner's, manager's and other staff members drove departing guests to their cars other's clear ice from their cars. This is customer service at it best! We fly from Indianapolis often and will always stay at this Comfort Inn. We highly recommend this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Fine experience”
Reviews.Author: bodee1999
Reviews.Content: I was nervous about the negative reviews but still wanted to give it a try as it met most of my criteria for the trip--inexpensive yet clean, safe, convenient location and a fun pool for my 3 and 6 year old boys. Overall it was a great experience for the price. Our room and all common areas (except pool/playground) were updated and clean. Pool and play areas are in need of remodeling but were still fun. Found the free breakfast convenient and also the microwave in lobby an easy way to "make dinner" we had bought at local grocery as opposed to going out. Staff was helpful.

Reviews.Title: “Safe and Very Clean”
Reviews.Author: simplyrhed
Reviews.Content: We used the Park Sleep and Fly program for our trip out of the country. I was very pleased and appreciated the ability to leave our car and know it was safe in the well lit parking lot. The person answering the phones at the front desk when we returned for our card was very pleasant; we were grateful that the shuttle is very prompt and was there to pick us up exactly when they said they would be there. FREE SHUTTLE SERVICE TO AND FROM THE AIRPORT!! Great place to stay and very friendly, courteous staff.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel could be better”
Reviews.Author: Maryker
Reviews.Content: We just returned from a weekend at Comfort Inn & Suites West in Indianapolis. I read the reviews prior to our trip and was a bit leery but based on the cost of other hotels in the area we decided to try it. There were 6 of us in our party - with 2 rooms reserved. Our room included in a refrig. but no microwave while the 2nd room had neither. The fan in the bathroom sounded like an airplane overhead and this was in both rooms. The furnishings could be updated - very simple table, desk, drawer, and nightstand. While watching tv we kept hearing a high pitch screeching and finally determined it to be the tv. The room itself was clean but the layout is different with the bath area split up into two areas - a toliet area and then a separate sink area. This would normally be fine but it just seemed to be congested. The kids were excited with the pool until we got a chance to go there on Sat. night. It was so hot in the pool area it was actually uncomfortable. The kids were saying there were worn areas on the bottom of the pool where it seemed to have worn to sand. The breakfast area needs to be updated too. We saw mold on the walls and peeling paint. Would I stay here again? No - I would not. We've always enjoyed staying at Comfort Inns but this one needs some work. We saw in the their local phone book how this hotel had won awards - not sure why. I know there are much nicer hotels in that area.

Reviews.Title: “Loved the pool area”
Reviews.Author: camper54403
Reviews.Content: Passing thru from North / South Carolina back home to Wisconsin after a wedding. Loved everything about the facility-pool especially. Front desk personnel were friendly, offering a good recommendation for pizza and even a tattoo.

Reviews.Title: “Will not stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: craftgrrl1220
Reviews.Content: My extended family and I came to Indy for a mini family vacation to the Children's museum and the zoo. We picked this hotel because it seemed like a good choice for kids. It wasn't. We booked 2 King rooms for 4 adults and two small children directly with the hotel. We asked for them to be connecting. When we got to the hotel we were told that they did not have king rooms that connected, We could have queen rooms that connect for an additional $10 per room per night! The hotel itself was not maintained well. Wall paper was peeling, the pool was peeling and missing concrete inside. The play room jungle gym's poles had foam covers that were split open and falling out. Everything was grimy. There was only one elevator for the whole hotel and during the morning time it was in constant use by the house cleaning staff. The breakfast bar had coffee, oatmeal, 3 types of dry cereal, breads, bagels and pastry and a waffle station, yogurt, apple and orange juice. There was ample seating and high chairs. The rooms were okay, my husband cut his foot on carpet tacks that had come up on the floor. The hotel wifi did not work and we were credited $15 back. In all we were disappointed with the hotel. We had stayed in other comfort inns that were much nicer. We will pick a different hotel for our next trip.

Reviews.Title: “These people love their business”
Reviews.Author: vroachamp2007
Reviews.Content: I'm am in the service industry and hope that my customers view my service efforts as I view this hotels. The extra mile seems to be the norm here. Kind, courteous and knowledgable staff helped make this stay enjoyable. The facility is well kept with noticable efforts to make it even better. I will make sure this hotel is the choice for our company when we travel to Indianapolis. Lou Caposey Renaissance Management

Reviews.Title: “One of the worst”
Reviews.Author: energydude
Reviews.Content: While the location to the airport was good and the front desk staff was helpful the condition and quality of this location was awful. The pull out couch advertised would not, so my son slept on the floor. The "suite" was just a larger room with a couch. The whirlpool would not work. A small TV with few channels. I'm just not used in this day and age of competitive logding to find such blatant disregard for the facilities. I was surprised mostly. Bottom line - stay away from this one.

Reviews.Title: “Condom in Room”
Reviews.Author: longroadhome
Reviews.Content: Blood on sheets, Condom inbetween sheets!! Called front desk for a room move, they said they were full and that laubdry would be done in 2 hours! It was already 10pm! Harry (the owner) told me he could call me when the sheets were ready. He never called back. I stripped the bed and slept on mattress. I never felt so dirty in my life. When I went down to talk to the owners 'Alex & Harry' Harry denied that I ever called! They then cornered me and said I planted the things in the room to get a refund. I told them it wasn't my blood on those sheets. They said they would refuse to talk with a woman (me) and wanted to talk to my husband (who is in Iraq). My two girls were crying seeinng how these men were yelling at their mother. As I left a kind spanish housekeeper told me that in order to save moey they were not allowexd to change the sheets everyday even when it is a checkout! For your own health stay away!

Reviews.Title: “Park 3 blocks away?!”
Reviews.Author: MBrack
Reviews.Content: I checked in at 1:30 am after a nightmarish day of cancelled flights, computer glitches and rude customer service courtesy of United Airlines. The Comfort Inn was fine - exactly what you expect. I called because I was lost and they offered to send their van driver to find me so I could follow him! Thought this was a lovely gesture, but I found my way there unassisted. When I checked in two things went wrong: 1) they insisted that they did not award SW Rapid Reward credits (they do); and 2) I was told that I would have to park 3 blocks away at Sam's Club! When I asked if it was even safe for a woman to walk around that neighborhood at 1:30 am the clerk said "probably not". When I started to cry (it had been quite a day), he said "just park in a handicap spot - we don't care". Clean, fairly quiet, decent breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff- Horrible Owner”
Reviews.Author: Cathyinpa
Reviews.Content: Where do I start? I booked a block of 10 rooms 1/16/07. Someone there cancelled all rooms 1/31/07 and never told us. Bumped 3/4 of us to the Sleep Inn. When you read the other reviews about the phones not working believe them! that also means you are unable to order pizza. Due to a security policy you must use a hotel phone but if if all the hotel phones are down...No pizza for the group!!!! The ants...yeah... that's trus also... but they are literally climbing up the walls at both here and the Sleep Inn, which by the way are owned by the same person. The staff is great but there is quick turnaround due to the owners lack of response to correct issues correctly. Staff takes a good bit of the beatings from the guests. Let me see we didn't have hot water for one day. One of the vehicles got stripped of all 4 tires/wheels in the parking lot the next day. Noone could use the shuttle because the owner had received moey from one group for the sole use of the shuttle. Then, of course, I can't forget the fire alarm which evacuated the building, which fortunately was a false alarm! Oh yeah, 4 of us had booked suites and had confirmed suites and got a double room. They had reserved 60 non smoking rooms when they only have 35. There are obviously some serious issues with how this hotel is operated. Becky the director of sales that I had worked with, which is not the person that cancelled our reservations, that was a prior director. Becky's last day was Wednesday 4/4 because she just couldn't continue working in the role she was in. I have stayed in numerous Choice Hotels and this hotel does not meet the criteris. Do not stay here!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Great amenities, next to airport!”
Reviews.Author: AL-the-squid
Reviews.Content: Stayed here 30 Dec, 2006 and also in late Dec 2005. Why we love it: Free airport shuttle - about 5 minutes from IND, Free breakfast, Free internet (with a printer to print boarding passes, etc), large pool (we swam last year and it was a little chilly), decent exercise room, fun kids area. Wonderful lobby area with TV, comfy sofas and hot chocolate/coffee available. This year they gave us an upgrade to a jacuzzi suite. It was wonderful! Thanks!

Reviews.Title: “not sure?”
Reviews.Author: sar1279
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the comfort inn west for two nights and bought the zoo package along with our room and as soon as I arrived the lady at the front desk knew who I was and had tickets ready to go! They have a very helpful staff and are very affordable! However we wanted to watch a movie and neither of our phones worked to call it in! The man at the front desk had to come in our room and fix it while our two little ones were sleeping! then after 30 min. or so we got the movie going and it was all fuzzy:( It is definetly a kid friendly hotel however afetr we were about 20min. I noticed ll of our socks were BLACK! GROSS! So from there on out all I could think about is my soon dragging his blanket around on the nasty floors!! And as we were leaving there were ant by our sink!Make sure to bring your houseshoes!

Reviews.Title: “kid friendly”
Reviews.Author: a.thompson
Reviews.Content: my husband and my kids took me here for mothers day this year and i loved it the kids were very pleased with the pool and the game room if you have kids i recomend that you stay here its also a nice hotel in general but the most important thing for me is that they didnt mind the kids running in and out

Reviews.Title: “Would stay again”
Reviews.Author: SharonRN
Reviews.Content: This hotel is in many ways above the bar for Comfort Inns. The staff was friendly and helpful, the free transportation drivers were extremely friendly and accomodating, the breakfast and the hostess were lovely, the room was very clean except for the carpet which is old, typical hotel carpet. The pool and whirlpool were nice, the mattresses were way above what you expect at a hotel; I haven't slept that well in any other hotel bed. There was no noise, the room was good sized. I wish every town I travel to had a Comfort like this one.
